forum.content:
so sorry...
In case I m on ur way, then I will back a step.

Let you fly to where u want.

Maybe it's a big fault to fall in love with u...

I still waiting for u, if u turn ur head back to me...

I'll give u all of mine

Although we don't have much time.

I can do my best to let you smile😢

If you accept

If...

just " If ".....
forum.title: Bitter love
